### createPassConfig() {#a4b93f5a67e7f89baaa536bc85fc7eba6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TargetPassConfig &#42; BPFTargetMachine::createPassConfig (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

createPassConfig - Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

Targets may override this to extend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig">TargetPassConfig</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-h">BPFTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-cpp/#l00106">106</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-cpp">BPFTargetMachine.cpp</a>.

### getTargetTransformInfo() {#ad58c6663ebba14eda42ae400cebf47b0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TargetTransformInfo BPFTargetMachine::getTargetTransformInfo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> for a given function.

The returned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> is specialized to the subtarget corresponding to <code>F</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-h">BPFTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-cpp/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpftargetmachine-cpp">BPFTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
